simulations.title: Geometric Hole Etching
simulations.description: Geometric etching of a cylindrical hole using the "ConstantRates"-Model. The symmetry allows to only simulate a quarter of the cylindric hole by applying reflective boundary conditions in the lateral directions.

simulations.title: Physical Hole Etching
simulations.description: Physical etching of a cylindrical hole using the "SF6_CH2F2PlasmaEtching"-Model. The symmetry allows to only simulate a quarter of the cylindric hole by applying reflective boundary conditions in the lateral directions.

simulations.title: Geometric Air Gap Deposition
simulations.description: Two-dimensional geometric deposition process creating an air gap using the "ConstantRates"-Model.

simulations.title: Physical Air Gap Deposition
simulations.description: Two-dimensional physical deposition process creating an air gap using the "NonlinearDeposition"-Model.

simulations.title: Geometric HAR Etch
simulations.description: Emulation of a highly direction etch using the "ConstantRates"-Model.

simulations.title: Physical HAR Etch
simulations.description: High aspect ratio Si etch using a slightly tilted source characteristic and the "SF6_CH2F2PlasmaEtching"-Model.

simulations.title: Geometric Deposition
simulations.description: Two-dimensional deposition processes using the "ConstantRates"-Model and varying "direction"-parameter.

simulations.title: Stacked Nanosheet
simulations.description: Geometry creation of a stacked nanosheet geometry through a sequence of emulated processes, i.e., using the "ConstantRates"-Model and boolean operations
